name: Fishing frenzy (itch)
description:
In this game you move your fishing hook left and right to catch as many fish as possible. The hook will move down endless, until you catch something. Then it will get realed in and you have a chance to catch even more fish.

Controls:
Left: the left arrow key or any key on the left side of the keyboard that has a letter or number on it.
Right: the right arrow key or any key on the right side of the keyboard that has a letter or number on it.

There is no music, so if you don't hear anything, that's supposed to happen.
